docs.lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Mass., Feb. 27. -- Out at Wayside Inn, South Sudbury, tribute has been paid to the 117th birthday of Henry W. Longfellow, the poet, by flying flags. The tribute was ordered by Henry Ford, the new owner of the inn.

headline.main: FORD HONORS LONGFELLOW; Has Flags Flown on His Wayside Inn at South Sudbury.

docs.abstract: convicted of cruelty to charges on Springville (S I) baby farm
